text: Juna kuraharula'i timile allaha baheka puja gardachau tiniharu matra nama hun, juna timile ra timra purkhaharule namakarana garihaleka chau. Kinabhane allahale tiniharuko kunai pramana patha'eko chaina. Sunirakha ki allaha baheka aru kasaiko satta chaina. Usale adesa gareko cha, ki usa baheka kasaiko puja nagara, yahi sojho dharma ho tara dherai manisaharu jandainan
